data.name: ChooseAnArticle.Text
data.value: [Choose an article]

data.name: lblDisplayRatings.Text
data.value: Rating display mode:

data.name: lblCommentSubmit.Text
data.value: Allow readers to submit comments:

data.name: lblDisplayRatings.Help
data.value: Choose whether to completely disable ratings for this module, to show the current average rating for the selected article, or to display the average and also allow users to submit their own ratings.

data.name: lblCommentSubmit.Help
data.value: If checked, users will no longer be able to submit comments through this display.

data.name: lblCommentDisplay.Help
data.value: If checked, comments will no longer display alongside the article.

data.name: lblCommentDisplay.Text
data.value: Display reader comments:

data.name: lblDisplayComments.Help
data.value: Choose whether to display only a certain number of comments at a time, or all comments.

data.name: lblDisplayComments.Text
data.value: Comment display mode:

data.name: cvCommentPaging.Text
data.value: Value must be an Integer

data.name: lblCommentPaging.Text
data.value: Comments per page

data.name: lblCommentPaging.Help
data.value: The number of comments to be displayed per page.

data.name: Disable.Text
data.value: Disable

data.name: Enable.Text
data.value: Enable

data.name: Paging.Text
data.value: One At A Time

data.name: ReadOnly.Text
data.value: Read Only

data.name: ShowAll.Text
data.value: Show All

data.name: lblEnableComments.Text
data.value: Comments are currently disabled on this site. Please adjust the site settings if you would like to allow users to submit and view comments in this module.

data.name: lblEnableRatings.Text
data.value: Ratings are currently disabled on this site. Please adjust the site settings if you would like to allow users to submit and view ratings in this module.

data.name: cvCommentPaging_Range.Text
data.value: Value must be greater than zero

data.name: lblCommentRandom.Help
data.value: If checked, comments will be displayed one-at-a-time, in random order. Choose "Paging" for the comment display mode if you would like users to be able to view other comments without reloading the whole page.

data.name: lblCommentRandom.Text
data.value: Randomly Display a Comment:

data.name: Full.Text
data.value: Full

data.name: Initial.Text
data.value: Initial

data.name: lblEmailAddressCollect.Help
data.value: If checked, the comment submission box will include a place for the commenter to include their email address; otherwise the commenter will not be able to submit their email address with the comment.

data.name: lblEmailAddressCollect.Text
data.value: Collect Email Address:

data.name: lblFirstNameCollect.Help
data.value: Choose whether to ask for the full first name, only the first initial, or not to ask for the first name at all when a user submits a comment.

data.name: lblFirstNameCollect.Text
data.value: First Name Collection Option:

data.name: lblLastNameCollect.Help
data.value: Choose whether to ask for the full last name, only the last initial, or not to ask for the last name at all when a user submits a comment.

data.name: lblLastNameCollect.Text
data.value: Last Name Collection Option:

data.name: None.Text
data.value: None

data.name: lblLastUpdatedFormat.Help
data.value: Example: To display Jun 2007 enter MMM yyyy

data.name: lblLastUpdatedFormat.Text
data.value: Last Updated Formatting (ex: MMM yyyy)

data.name: cvPhotoGalleryMaxCount.Text
data.value: Maximum Number of Thumbnails must be a positive, integer value. If you do not want to show thumbnails, uncheck the Display Thumbnails from Photo Gallery check box. If you want to display all thumbnails, check the option to show all.

data.name: lblDisplayPhotoGallery.Help
data.value: You have the option to link a photo gallery to your article if it is installed on your site and allowed in Publish's site settings. If a gallery is linked to the displayed article, thumbnails from that gallery will display beside the article.

data.name: lblDisplayPhotoGallery.Text
data.value: Display Thumbnails from Photo Gallery:

data.name: lblEnablePhotoGallery.Text
data.value: Photo Gallery Integration is currently disabled on this site. Please adjust the site settings if you would like to allow thumbnails from photo galleries to be displayed alongside articles.

data.name: lblPhotoGalleryMaxCount.Help
data.value: If you are displaying thumbnails, you can choose how many of the thumbnails from the gallery to display.

data.name: lblPhotoGalleryMaxCount.Text
data.value: Maximum Number of Thumbnails to Display:

data.name: MaxCount.Text
data.value: Set a maximum number of thumbnails:

data.name: rfvPhotoGalleryMaxCount.Text
data.value: You must supply a maximum number of thumbnails, or check the option to show all.

data.name: cvPhotoGalleryHoverThumbnailHeight.Text
data.value: The Height of the Popup Thumbnail must be an integer value, or blank.

data.name: cvPhotoGalleryHoverThumbnailWidth.Text
data.value: The Width of the Popup Thumbnail must be an integer value, or blank.

data.name: lblPhotoGalleryHoverThumbnailHeight.Help
data.value: Set a height in pixels to force the popup thumbnails to conform to, if you want the popup to be smaller than the images in the gallery itself. Leave this blank if you do not want to constrain the thumbnails' height. We recommend leaving either the height or width blank so that images aren't distorted if they aren't the correct ratio.

data.name: lblPhotoGalleryHoverThumbnailHeight.Text
data.value: Height of Popup Thumbnails:

data.name: lblPhotoGalleryHoverThumbnailWidth.Help
data.value: Set a width in pixels to force the popup thumbnails to conform to, if you want the popup to be smaller than the images in the gallery itself. Leave this blank if you do not want to constrain the thumbnails' width. We recommend leaving either the height or width blank so that images aren't distorted if they aren't the correct ratio.

data.name: lblPhotoGalleryHoverThumbnailWidth.Text
data.value: Width of Popup Thumbnails:

data.name: cvPhotoGalleryThumbnailHeight.Text
data.value: The Height of the Gallery Thumbnail must be an integer value, or blank.

data.name: cvPhotoGalleryThumbnailWidth.Text
data.value: The Width of the Gallery Thumbnail must be an integer value, or blank.

data.name: lblPhotoGalleryThumbnailHeight.Help
data.value: Set a height in pixels for the thumbnails from the photo gallery associated with an article. Leave this blank if you fo not want to constrain the thumbnails' height. We recommend leaving either the height or width blank so that images aren't distorted.

data.name: lblPhotoGalleryThumbnailHeight.Text
data.value: Height of Gallery Thumbnails:

data.name: lblPhotoGalleryThumbnailWidth.Help
data.value: Set a width in pixels for the thumbnails from the photo gallery associated with an article. Leave this blank if you do not want to constrain the thumbnails' width. We recommend leaving either the height or width blank so that images aren't distorted.

data.name: lblPhotoGalleryThumbnailWidth.Text
data.value: Width of Gallery Thumbnails:

data.name: lblUrlCollect.Help
data.value: If checked, the comment submission box will include a place for the commenter to include their URL; otherwise the commenter will not be able to submit their URL with the comment.

data.name: lblUrlCollect.Text
data.value: Collect URL:
